trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects that can be individually accessed by index.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> objetos que podem ser acedidos individualmente por índice.

trans-unit.source: Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.
trans-unit.target: Exceto conforme indicado, os membros desta classe comportar-se exatamente conforme descrito pelo <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, e <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>documentação.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the PathSegmentCollection class provides several special features: PathSegmentCollection objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Funcionalidades freezable:** porque qual herda o <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>classe, a classe de PathSegmentCollection fornece várias funcionalidades especiais: PathSegmentCollection objetos podem ser declarados como, partilhada entre vários objetos, tornados só de leitura para melhorar o desempenho, clonar e efetuados seguro para thread.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as diferentes funcionalidades fornecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos, consulte o [descrição geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements* One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de coleção implícita XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements* um ou mais objetos, declarados utilizando a sintaxe do elemento de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> class with the specified collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> classe da coleção de especificada <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects that make up the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> objetos que compõem o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: collection is .
trans-unit.target: collectionis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> class with the specified capacity, or the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects the collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> classe com a capacidade especificada ou o número de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> a coleção é inicialmente com capacidade para armazenar os objetos.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects that the collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> que a coleção é inicialmente com capacidade para armazenar os objetos.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> ao fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, they are copied when they are used.
trans-unit.target: Porque <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>objetos derivam <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, são copiados quando são utilizadas.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might not be able to later retrieve or remove the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> you added to the collection using the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> object; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> in the collection is a copy of the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> and is considered a different <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> than the one you added.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, não poderá mais tarde obter ou remova o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>adicionado à coleção utilizando original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>objeto; o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>na coleção é uma cópia do original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>é considerado um diferentes <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>que adicionou.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário das implementações típicas de <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, esta implementação emite um <xref:System.ArgumentException>se tentar adicionar um **nulo** (**nada**) referência.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The segment to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O segmento para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of all segments and resets <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Count*> to zero.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os segmentos de limpa e repõe <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Count*>a zero.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: This method does not change the capacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Este método não altera a capacidade de <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>, efetuar cópias profundas de valores deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Quando copiar propriedades de dependência, este método copia enlaces de referências e os dados de recursos (mas já não poderão resolver), mas não animações ou os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade serão <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo se a origem <> </> *> propriedade foi<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> objeto, tornando profundas cópias dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: As referências de recurso, enlaces de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade serão <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo se a origem <> </> *> propriedade foi <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Boolean>que indica se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> está contido dentro da coleção.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> para procurar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is contained within the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> está contida dentro da coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> to a one-dimensional <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia toda a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> para um unidimensional <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> matriz, que começa no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The array into which the collection's items are to be copied.
trans-unit.target: A matriz para o qual itens da coleção estão a ser copiado.

trans-unit.source: The index of `array` at which to start copying the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice da `array` no qual pretende iniciar a copiar o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of items in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o número de itens na origem de é superior ao espaço disponível desde o index ao fim do destino array.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of path segments contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de segmentos de caminho contidas no <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of path segments contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de segmentos de caminho contidas no <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um enumerador que pode itere através da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeradores permitem apenas ao ler os dados na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeradores não podem ser utilizados para modificar a colecção subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, o enumerador está posicionado antes do primeiro item na coleção.

trans-unit.source: also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: também oferece o enumerador novamente para nesta posição.

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: AT isto posicionar, chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, tem de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>para avançar o enumerador para o primeiro item da coleção antes de ler o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>Devolve o mesmo objeto até ser <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the next item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>Define <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>para o item seguinte.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Após o final da colecção é passado, o enumerador está posicionado depois do último item na coleção e chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>devolve `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se a última chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>devolvido `false`, chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the first item of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para definir <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>o primeiro item da coleção novamente, pode chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>seguido <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador permanece válido desde que a coleção permanece inalterada.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Caso sejam feitas alterações à coleção, tais como adicionar, modificar ou eliminar itens, o enumerador está irrevogavelmente inválido e a próxima chamada ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>emitir um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: Se a coleção é modificada entre <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>irá devolver o item que está definido, mesmo que o enumerador já é invalidado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador não tem acesso exclusivo à coleção; Por conseguinte, a enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento seguro para thread.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção está sincronizada, outros threads ainda foi possível modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador acionar uma excepção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, pode bloquear a coleção durante a enumeração de toda ou detetar exceções resultantes das alterações efetuadas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator> that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator>que pode itere através da coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o índice da primeira ocorrência de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The item to search for.
trans-unit.target: O item para procurar.

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice especificado da <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> into this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> neste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário das implementações típicas de <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, esta implementação emite um <xref:System.ArgumentException>se tentar inserir uma **nulo** (**nada**) referência.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index at which to insert `value`, the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice no qual pretende inserir `value`, especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The item to insert.
trans-unit.target: O item de inserção.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: index is not a valid index in the .
trans-unit.target: indexNão é um índice válido no .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> at the specified zero-based index.

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
